class.name: Logger
class.description: Logger class for centralized logging functionality.

class.name: Rarer
class.description: Class for handling RAR compression and extraction using SharpCompress.

class.name: Zipper
class.description: Class for handling ZIP compression (currently empty implementation).

class.name: Config
class.description: A singleton class for managing application configuration settings, including database connections, logging, VLC library settings, subtitles, updates, and plugins. Supports loading and saving configuration data to a JSON file with thread-safe access.

class.name: PlaylistConfig
class.description: A class representing the configuration settings for playlists in the application. Stores properties such as default playlist path, shuffle mode, repeat mode, auto-play settings, and a list of media file paths or URIs.

class.name: IPlaylistConfig
class.description: Represents the configuration settings for playlists in the application. Provides properties to define the default playlist path, shuffle mode, repeat mode, auto-play behavior, and a list of media file paths or URIs.

class.name: OpenAiConfig
class.description: Configuration class for OpenAI API key.

class.name: PerformanceMonitorConfig
class.description: Configuration settings for performance monitoring, including enable flag, interval, and log file path.

class.name: PluginConfig
class.description: Represents the configuration settings for a plugin in the application. Provides properties to store the plugin's name, file path, enabled status, version, and description.

class.name: Shadow
class.description: Represents the configuration settings for a shadow effect in the application. Stores properties such as color, depth, opacity, blur radius, and visibility for a shadow effect.

class.name: SubtitleConfig
class.description: Represents the configuration settings for subtitles in the application. Provides properties to define the font size, font family, font color, and shadow settings for subtitle display.

class.name: UpdateConfig
class.description: Represents the configuration settings for application updates. Provides properties to define whether updates are checked, the URLs for updates and version information, file paths, version details, and timing settings for update checks.

class.name: ConsoleWriteLine
class.description: Static class for extending Console.WriteLine functionality with class name and timestamp logging.

class.name: ControlBar
class.description: UserControl for media player control bar, handling play, pause, volume, playlist, and other UI interactions.

class.name: IControlBar
class.description: Interface defining buttons for media control bar.

class.name: InfoBox
class.description: UserControl for displaying information boxes with fade animations.

class.name: IProgressBar
class.description: Interface for progress bar (empty definition).

class.name: PlaylistView
class.description: A custom ListView control for managing a playlist of video media items. Provides functionality to play, pause, remove, and reorder videos, with support for user interactions like double-click, right-click context menu actions, and drag-and-drop reordering with a drop shadow effect for the dragged item.

class.name: ProgressChangedEventArgs
class.description: Event arguments for progress changed events during updates.

class.name: Updat
class.description: A class responsible for checking, downloading, and applying application updates. Uses configuration settings from the Config class and supports asynchronous operations with progress reporting and error handling.

class.name: UpdateAvailableEventArgs
class.description: Event arguments for when a new update is available.

class.name: UpdateErrorEventArgs
class.description: Event arguments for update errors.

class.name: CommandLineHandler
class.description: Static class for processing command-line arguments for the application.

class.name: DragDropHelper
class.description: Static class providing attached properties for drag-over detection.

class.name: GeneratorHelper
class.description: Helper class for generating command-line help messages.

class.name: MathHelper
class.description: Static class providing clamping methods for values.

class.name: OptionHelper
class.description: Helper class representing command-line options.

class.name: PathCheckHelper
class.description: Class for checking if a path is a file, URL, or neither.

class.name: ResizeControlHelper
class.description: Helper class for enabling resizing and moving of FrameworkElements.

class.name: ScreenHelper
class.description: Static class for handling fullscreen toggling and window size retrieval.

class.name: ShowHideControlsHelper
class.description: Class providing asynchronous show/hide methods for controls with delays.

class.name: StoryboardHelper
class.description: A static helper class that provides extension methods for animating the visibility of WPF controls using storyboards. It supports asynchronous hiding and showing of controls with error handling and logging for animation operations.

class.name: VideoTypeChecker
class.description: Class for checking video file types (AVI, MP4, M3U8) and handling M3U8 streams.

class.name: WindowLastStance
class.description: Class for storing the last window state, mode, and style.

class.name: WindowPropertiesExtensions
class.description: Static class providing extension methods for centering windows to the mouse cursor.
